text: @replouiegohmert What a stupid response. Let’s go with your statement, If your mask got the coronavirus on it what makes you think that your nasal cavity wouldn’t get it if you didn’t have a mask?  Would it turn away because you don’t have a mask. Shame on you for forcing staff not to wear mask.
